item.title: Re: Buiying Kaiju Drops?
item.content:encoded: Do the awesome points you spend reset after looping? For example, I spent it all to get extra range, after I loop, do I get the points back and be able to choose a new ability?

item.title: Re: Buiying Kaiju Drops?
item.content:encoded: Now that the recode has been released your trophy room has completely changed. Instead of the old trophies you now earn them for various exploits in the game such as looping to season 2, getting certain themes, ect. Go to your trophy room and there will be a link to check what trophies you have earned and with those your receive either 5, 10, or 20 awesome points depending on the difficulty of achieving it. With those awesome points you can buy bonuses like extra stamina, levels, range, storm points, and a bunch of other stuff.

item.title: Re: Buiying Kaiju Drops?
item.content:encoded: Could you explain the awesome points to me then please?

item.title: Re: Buiying Kaiju Drops?
item.content:encoded: I have not heard anything about buying Kaiju drops, however you may be thinking of Awesome Points, which will allow you to buy bonuses for your character.
